Most popular

License Agreement

License Agreement
The above licenses are a one time purchase, and include free updates for the lifetime of version 5.

OEM/SaaS Licenses

If you want to include iframe-resizer in downloadable or installable products such as Themes, Component Libraries, as part of a commercial interface builder, SDK, or toolkit, choose the Commercial OEM/SaaS license. These licenses are customized for each customer.

Contact Us

Free for Open Source

iframe-resizer is an Open Source application licensed under a GPL v3 license. This license allows you to use iframe-resizer in Open Source projects but it requires your project and source code be publicly published, include attribution, and be licensed under GPL v3.

Questions? Read the GPL FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Answers to the most common questions about licensing

Can I try iframe-resizer before buying it?

Yes! You're welcome to try the library using the open source version. You will need to buy a license if you want to use it in a commercial project.

See the Getting Started guide for more information.

Is it a one-time payment?

The Solo, Professional and Business licenses are a one-time payment and include future updates to version 5.

If you want to include iframe-resizer in downloadable or installable products like Wordpress themes, HTML templates, as part of a commercial interface builder, SDK, or toolkit, you'll need a Commercial OEM license. Commercial OEM licenses are customized for each customer. Contact Us if you need this license.

Can I use iframe-resizer to build commercial products?

Yes. You can use the Commercial licenses available at the top of this page, for use in non open sourced projects that are not compatible with the GPL v3 license.

What counts as a Domain?

A Domain is a single Origin, which is defined by the scheme (protocol), hostname (domain), and port of the URL used to access it. Two pages have the same origin only when the scheme, hostname, and port all match.

Can I use iframe-resizer to create a widget to place on other websites?

Yes, you can use the Business license to create widgets that can be embedded on other websites.

Can I use iframe-resizer in a component library?

Yes, but you need to leave the license field unset and allow the end user to add their own license key

Is support included in the license?

The Business license includes premium support and is provided via priority email/phone/zoom for setup and integration questions.

The Solo and Professional licenses only include standard support via Github Issues.

Can I use the license for multiple projects?

The Business license allows you to use the library in an unlimited number of websites and mobile apps.

Can I be refunded?

Refunds are not currently available. Please try the open source version before purchasing a license.

Can I upgrade from one license to another?

Absolutely! You can upgrade from one license to another. Please buy the upgraded license and then Contact Us with your original order number and we will refund the original purchase.
